ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities.
2MP Camera; Expandable Memory; MP3 Player and FM Radio; SMS / EMS / MMS and E-Mail.
Lost Mobile Tracker; Smart Power Saving (Auto Lighting Control); Sleek & Slim Slider (11.9mm) whit a 2.2"QVGA Display.
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 500 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG GD330 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2MP Camera, FM Radio, E-mail, Stereo Bluetooth and MicroSD Slot --International Version with Warranty (Black)
